items.title: Mass shooting at South African bar leaves 12 dead, including 3 children
items.description: A mass shooting at a bar near Pretoria, South Africa, has left at least 12 people dead, including three children

items.title: WATCH:  Netflix set to buy Warner Bros. in deal valued at $83 billion
items.description: Netflix has announced it has entered a "definitive agreement" to acquire Warner Bros., including its film and television studios, HBO Max and HBO.
